column2: "Dɛm ntsi ɔsɛ dɛ yɛhwɛ ndzɛmba a yɛatse no yie papaara
column3: amma da bi yaammfom emmfi ho."

column2: "Na sɛ asɛm a wɔnam abɔfo no do kae no tsimii
column3: na mbrato nye asoɔdzen biara nyaa n’akatua a ɔsɛ a
column6: sɛ yebu hɛn enyi gu nkwagye kɛse a ɔtse dɛm yi do a
column7: yɛbɛyɛ dɛn efi nsa? Iyi na Ewuradze dzii kan kae
column8: na hɔn a wɔtsee no hyɛɛ no dzen maa hɛn;"

column2: "na Nyankopɔn so nam nsɛnkyerɛdze nye anwanwadze nye tum ndwuma horow nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn akyɛdze do dɛ mbrɛ ɔnoara ɔpɛ no
"Na nnyɛ abɔfo no ase na ɔdze wiadze a ɔreba a yɛka ho asɛm no ahyɛ."
"Na obi dzii dase wɔ beebi dɛ Ɔdasanyi nye woana
column3: na ekaa no? Anaa nyimpa ba nye woana
column4: a w’enyi wɔ no do yi?"

column2: "Ama aka kakra ma ɔato abɔfo; Edze enyimnyam nye enyidzi abɔ no abɔtsir
column3: [Na edze no esi wo nsaano edwuma do:]"

column2: "Edze adze nyina ahyɛ n’ananadze. Na dɛ ɔdze adze nyina ahyɛ n’ase no
column3: oenngyaa biribiara a wɔammfa annhyɛ n’ase. Na sesei dze yennyae nnhun dɛ wɔdze ndzɛmba nyina ahyɛ n’ase."
ɔno a ber tsiabaa bi mu wɔbrɛɛ no adze seen abɔfo no
column4: ama ɔnam Nyankopɔn adom do asɔ owu ahwɛ ama nyimpa nyina. Seseiara
column5: osian owu amandzehu ntsi wɔdze enyimnyam nye enyidzi abɔ no abɔtsir."

column2: "Na ɔfataa onyia no a ndzɛmba nyina wɔ hɔ ma no na ndzɛmba nyina nam no do wɔ hɔ no dɛ
column3: ɔdze mba pii ba enyimnyam mu no
column4: ɔmaa hɔn nkwagye dzikamfo no nam amandzehu mu kɔr emudzi mu."

column3: nye hɔn a wɔsan hɔnho no nyina fi adze kor
column4: na dɛm ntsi ɔnnyɛ no enyito dɛ ɔbɛfrɛ hɔn enuanom
column7: Mobɔbɔ wo dzin akyerɛ mo nuanom; Mboanofo finimfin na mobɔtow ayɛyindwom ama wo."

column3: Medze mo werɛ bɔtwer no. Na bio
column6: nye mba a Nyankopɔn dze hɔn ama me."

column2: "Na dɛ mba no wɔ bɔgya nye honam no bi ntsi
column3: dɛmara na no so faa mu bi
column4: ama ɔnam owu do aama onyia no a ɔwɔ owu tum

column2: "na ɔaagye hɔn a owu ho suro ntsi wɔwɔ nkowaasom mu hɔn nkwaber nyina no."
"Na ampaara nnyɛ abɔfo na osuo hɔn mu gye hɔn
column3: na mbom Abraham asefo na osuo hɔn mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi okehiaa dɛ ɔsɛ no nuanom wɔ adze nyina mu
column3: ama ɔaayɛ ɔsɔfopanyin mbɔbɔrhufo nye nokwafo wɔ dza ɔfa Nyankopɔn ho no mu
column4: na ɔaayɛ ɔman no hɔn bɔn ho mpatadze."

column2: "Na osiandɛ wɔsɔɔ no hwɛe ma nankasa so hun amandze ntsi
column3: otum boa hɔn a wɔsɔ hɔn hwɛ no."
